featured.text: “Suits are expensive, if you have to wear one every day,” one person said.
The astronauts need a space suit to survive in space.
They have remained popular due to their convenience, and are often worn with bathing suits or summer clothing.
“I used to carry a fresh suit to work with me

other.text: Finding out which college suits you involves time and energy, but ___(25)___ more than those you might spend on buying a motorcycle or a computer.
It was then decided that Alan Shepard should relieve himself in his space suit, and continue with the mission as scheduled.
The moral lesson is “First 35 your strengths, and then change the playing field to suit them.”
They are protected by a space suit from the radiation of the Sun.
The astronauts can hardly breathe in a space suit.
The astronauts need a space suit to work outside the shuttle.
The Amazons are completely dependent on their slaves ____(29)___ their sharp jaws, so well suited for fighting, are useless in taking care of larvae or for digging.
The astronauts keep themselves warm in a space suit.
Is it a good idea to keep animals in sites not suited to them?

definition.zh_def: 一套正式的衣服，通常由西裝外套和褲子組成，常用於商務或正式場合。
definition.en_def: A set of formal clothing, typically consisting of a jacket and trousers, often worn for business or formal occasions.
definition.example: He wore a tailored suit to the job interview.
